snippet: Despite its star founders, Steven Spielberg and Stacey Snider, DreamWorks Studios has been struggling as a smaller player in Hollywood.
abstract: Despite its star founders, Steven Spielberg and Stacey Snider, DreamWorks Studios has been struggling as a smaller player in Hollywood.

byline.original: By MICHAEL CIEPLY and BROOKS BARNES

headline.main: A Slimmer DreamWorks Gets a New Financing Deal
headline.print_headline: DreamWorks Studios Solidifies Financing From Indian Media Firm
